attributes.action: Prince Edward to pay back £37,000 of tax payers money used for a private jet.
attributes.additional_details: As reported in the daily newspapers 13.06.2018
attributes.background: Headline article in the Daily Mail 13.06.2018.. an absolute disgrace. Taxpayers have funded the cost £37,000 of Prince Edward travelling 133 miles....rather than get a train costing £250.00....he should foot the bill.

rejection.details: This petition is calling on Price Edward, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
